title: 平價打機Laptop 有咩好選擇?

replies.msg:
https://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/B0764HW117/ref=mp_s_a_1_3?ie=UTF8&qid=1520250677&sr=8-3&pi=AC_SX236_SY340_FMwebp_QL65&keywords=dell+7577&dpPl=1&dpID=41-JTTQG9bL&ref=plSrch


用左呢部3個月, 幾好用, 打機GTA V CPU只係6X度, GPU 4x度, 散熱好, 機身幾硬淨,
但要留意一樣野, windows update左1709之後, 可能會有freezing情況, 其實大部份Intel CPU + GTX 1050/1050Ti/1060/1070都有呢個情況, intel/windows暫時未解決到, 可以望下以下intel forum睇下用家既問題, 唔急買就等等先喇, 對我就影響不太, 照用
https://communities.intel.com/thread/119093

mon就有d偏藍, 要去GPU setting tune下咁, 其餘都好正常
自己就換左2TB HD, 但我建議買再上一級既model, 跟機配16gb ram加7700HQ, 依家得 2x 4gb ram, 想升16gb就要重新買過2條8gb, 好貴

https://www.amazon.com/Dell-Inspiron-Gaming-Laptop-i7-7700HQ/dp/B077J39Q5Z/ref=sr_1_7?s=electronics&ie=UTF8&qid=1520400101&sr=1-7&keywords=dell+7577&dpID=41bYSoZNYtL&preST=_SY300_QL70_&dpSrc=srch

Dell Inspiron 15 Gaming Laptop: Core i7-7700HQ, 16GB RAM, 128GB SSD and 1TB HDD, GTX 1060 6GB, 15.6-inch Full HD Display

Price: $1,108.95 + $23.80 Shipping & Import Fees Deposit to Hong Kong
